body.title: My First English Lesson
body.content: Today I learned about past tense verbs. The key points are: regular verbs add -ed, irregular verbs have unique forms.

body.title: Grammar Rules - Present Perfect
body.content: Present perfect is formed with have/has + past participle. Used for actions that started in the past and continue to the present.

body.title: New Vocabulary Words
body.content: Words learned today: meticulous (careful attention to detail), ephemeral (lasting for a short time), ubiquitous (present everywhere).

body.title: Updated: My First English Lesson
body.content: Today I learned about past tense verbs. Updated: Regular verbs add -ed, irregular verbs have unique forms like go→went, see→saw.
Additional notes: Practice makes perfect. Remember to review these verbs daily.
